info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Westchester, west central Suffolk and northeastern Nassau Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 424 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rye, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Rochelle, Commack, Huntington Station, Port Chester, Deer Park, Glen Cove, Syosset, Huntington, Rye, Northport, Oyster Bay, Greenwich, Harrison, Dix Hills and Smithtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
